sentences.en: A computerized single pulse gnlvanestutic polarization apparatus with software system is developed.
sentences.cn: 研制了微机控制的单脉冲恒电流极化仪,并开发了软件系统.

sentences.en: And the polarization had been obvious gradually in the cell of county.
sentences.cn: 极化现象正在县级单元逐步变的明显.

sentences.en: Anomalies due to polarization can be so much larger than those resulting from topography.
sentences.cn: 极化产生的异常会远远大于地形引起的异常.

sentences.en: Around the world, the multi - polarization tendency is getting stronger.
sentences.cn: 环顾全球, 多极化趋势正在加速发展.

sentences.en: Cole - Cole model and Brown model of spectrum induced polarization are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了频谱激电法中的ColeCole模型和Brown模型.

sentences.en: Execute should notice to prevent polarization by allocation of factor of production.
sentences.cn: 实行按生产要素分配要注意防止两极分化.

sentences.en: For more detailed information on induced polarization, review papers by Madden.
sentences.cn: 关于诱发极化法的更详细的资料, 可参阅马登的述评文章.

sentences.en: Linearly polarized broadband dipoles serve as antennas for horizontal and vertical polarization.
sentences.cn: 线地为水平线极化了如天线的宽频双极子服务和垂直的偏极化.

sentences.en: Polarization is related to running the proper frequencies for your gender.
sentences.cn: 极化和运作与你性别合适的频率相关.

sentences.en: Reverse polarization is the result of improper gender balance.
sentences.cn: 相反的极性是性平衡不正确的结果.

sentences.en: Specifying the desired response is key to design of polarization interference filter.
sentences.cn: 期望输出的给定是偏振干涉滤光片设计的关键.

sentences.en: Test the polarization curve of the substrate and the different coating.
sentences.cn: 采用恒电位仪测定基体和不同镀层的极化曲线.

sentences.en: The result of this deception has been a needless polarization of society and untold suffering for those people who happen to fall in love with others of their own sex.
sentences.cn: 这样欺骗世人的结果就是形成了一个不必要的两极分化的社会，也让那些碰巧爱上同性的人们承受着难以言喻的痛苦。

sentences.en: The third - order nonlinear polarization for self - interaction in uniaxial crystals is dealt with.
sentences.cn: 讨论单轴晶体中三 阶 非线性自作用极化强度矢量的计算.

sentences.en: The world is moving further toward multi - polarization and economic globalization.
sentences.cn: 世界 多极化 和经济全球化趋势进一步发展.

sentences.en: Thermal radiator that absorbs completely all incident radiation, whatever the wavelength, the direction of incidence or the polarization.
sentences.cn: 对于所有入射辐射，无论波长、方向或者偏振情况如何，均完全吸收的热辐射体。

sentences.en: This ability is described by polarization crosstalk or polarization - holding parameter.
sentences.cn: 这种能力用偏振串话或偏振保持参数来描述.

sentences.en: This in turn left its mark on the polarization of the next photon, so amplifying the signal.
sentences.cn: 光子就这样轮流地将它的偏振标记留给下一个光子，因而增强了信号。

words.tran_cn: 极地的；两极的；正好相反的
人造偏光板；[光] 偏振片

phrases.tran_cn: 偏光显微镜，极化显微镜

trans.tran_cn: 产生极性，极化，（光）偏振，对立
